items.text: Saving and investing are my top priorities
Spending money now is how I find happiness
I make and follow long-term financial plans
If something looks good, I buy it on impulse
I focus on value rather than buying cheap
I actively use discounts, sales, and coupons
Spending on experiences and memories is worth it
Buying tangible items gives me satisfaction
I set specific financial goals with deadlines
Talking about money stresses me out
